ComicInfo.Title: The God of the Dead; A Rottin' Deal; Let the Dreamer Beware; Escape; Whence Stalked the Werewolf; Power of the Pen; Hag of the Blood Basket!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The God of the Dead: Dracula creates an army of the children of a village and then sends them to kill their parents.
A Rottin' Deal: Peter kills his uncle on a treasure hunt in the desert, but his uncle's rotting corpse haunts him.
Let the Dreamer Beware: Alex Nimbo murders his wife to get out of his hellish marriage and to get to the land of his dreams.
Escape: The imprisoned Baron Renphrew has a plan for his escape.
Whence Stalked the Werewolf: Psychiatrist Bund finds more than he bargained for when he makes a patient relive an earlier life.
Power of the Pen: Novelist Jeff Denning discovers that his typewriter gives life to his stories.
Hag of the Blood Basket!: Madam du Sade is sent to the guillotine and then to hell.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 11:28:30. [CVDB410619] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 01:37:35. [Issue ID 28062]
